Probably one of the most competitive FPS game currently. Lots of fun but can be ruined by playing online with random people. I recommend to play the game with friends as team mates as it will definitely help the playing experience.

Virou caça níquel, se você der sorte você não cai contra 5 hack 🤡

Counter Strike, é um jogo muito bom, porém mesmo com conteúdos novos, o jogo está um pouco abandonado e também tem muitos players tóxicos e hackers, fora isso, a mecanica do jogo é muito boa e fluida e nele a diversos modos de jogo também o que torna o jogo muito divertido
Acabaram com game quando deixaram free, virou uma festa pros hacks.

This is a really fun game, but it requires lots and lots of skill and a decent computer. I can run it but even on lowest settings i experience lag. Of course this isnt the games fault its just my computer. I still enjoy playing it and learning new tricks everyday though. I also do love how realistic it is. The only thing that bothers me is not being able to ADS which would help a lot, but i know they cant add that now. Overall i give it a 9/10

FYI, "Global Offensive" in Counter Strike : Global Offensive referred to the toxics
